channel.title: Fixing Ancient Magicks
channel.description:
I need a fix on the Barrage spells. I can't 'farcast' with them. Ice Barrage only works if you're standing on top of them, not if you're anywhere else. Not sure if this happens only on NPCs because I haven't tried it on players. I'm using Phonescape.
Also, my compile.bat isn't listening to me. I change my "@cya@Phone" to "@cya@Owns" and I do compile > run but it doesn't change!

item.title: Fixing Ancient Magicks
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

I need a fix on the Barrage spells. I can’t ‘farcast’ with them. Ice Barrage only works if you’re standing on top of them, not if you’re anywhere else. Not sure if this happens only on NPCs because I haven’t tried it on players.
I’m using Phonescape.

Also, my compile.bat isn’t listening to me. I change my “@cya@Phone” to “@cya@Owns” and I do compile > run but it doesn’t change!

Read full topic
